title: Recon (ability)
paragraphs: For the mode known as Recon, Recon (mode).
Recon is an ability in Splatoon.

When the user is at their spawn point, the user can see opponents' locations and weapons on . When the user leaves the spawn point, that effect continues for about 3.5 seconds, or about 1.75 seconds for opponents that have Cold-Blooded.
Recon is the main ability of:
- ▲ Duration of effect after leaving Spawn Point increased to 3.5 seconds.
- ▲ Recon will now also display each opponent's equipped weapon on the Turf Map.
